author: wn.com
title: Kelsey Grammer Pro Life T-Shirt Goes Viral
text: Actor Kelsey Grammer’s pro-life (or anti-abortion/anti-choice) T-shirt has prompted a lot of Internet controversy, with both supportive and opposing responses. A now-viral photo on his and wife Kayte’s Instagram page shows Grammer wearing a shirt containing language seemingly linking abortion to gun violence. Kayte herself also models a matching (other than color) shirt on the...
